title: Does anyone know this swirly font?
content:
Can you identify this font?

comments.content:
[Citadel Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414231323/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/citadel_script_std_regular/)

[Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20120414231323/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2)  
This is a formal flowing script font.
